name: The Root of all Evil (puglic, BigDylann, Isa730, JacksonDeVico)
name_original: The Root of all Evil (puglic, BigDylann, Isa730, JacksonDeVico)
description:
In an effort to save humanity from starvation resulting from overpopulation, scientists have developed a plant that grows at incredible speeds! But it's out of control! The Root of All Evil is an arcade-style shooter game in which you must hold off the plant for as long as possible using your trusty flamethrower.

***Xbox controller highly recommended***
